notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: M.G. designed and supervised the research; A.R. participated in the design of the study and conducted computational analyses together with M.G. and performed the literature survey; S.K., J.-S.S., H.B., K.L. and A.O.S. interpreted the results with A.R. and M.G.; A.R. and M.G. wrote the final version of the manuscript; M.G. conceived and managed the project. All authors read and approved the final manuscript.
